title: American Idol (season 2)
summary: The second season of American Idol premiered on January 21, 2003, and continued until May 21, 2003. The title of show was shortened from American Idol: The Search for a Superstar of Season 1 to just American Idol.[1]  Brian Dunkleman quit after the first season,[2] and Ryan Seacrest therefore became the lone host in Season 2 as well as all subsequent seasons.  Kristin Holt was a special correspondent.
